Protesters abseil inside Te Papa, deface the Treaty of Waitangi exhibition https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/protesters-abseil-inside-te-papa-deface-the-treaty-of-waitangi-exhibition/HL65OE45IFEJVITTCQBHQ6A43I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/protesters-abseil-inside-te-papa-deface-the-treaty-of-waitangi-exhibition/HL65OE45IFEJVITTCQBHQ6A43I/ Vita MolyneuxSeveral people have been arrested.
